mapper.select: SELECT PRENAMEDNAME FROM PICTURE A JOIN POST P ON(A.PNO=P.PNO) WHERE P.RNO=#{rno}

SELECT A.RNO, A.RNAME, SUBSTR(A.ADDRESS, 1, 7) "ADDRESS", NAME.PRENAMEDNAME FROM (SELECT ROUND(AVG_STAR, 1) "STAR", R.* FROM ( SELECT AVG(STAR) "AVG_STAR",COUNT(RNO), RNO FROM POST P GROUP BY RNO ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC) S JOIN RESTAURANT R ON(R.RNO=S.RNO) WHERE ROWNUM<10) A left JOIN (SELECT PC.*, P.RNO FROM( SELECT PRENAMEDNAME,PNO FROM PICTURE WHERE PLEVEL=0) PC JOIN POST P ON(P.PNO=PC.PNO) JOIN (SELECT MIN(PNO) "PNO", RNO FROM POST GROUP BY RNO) MINPOST ON(MINPOST.PNO=PC.PNO) )NAME ON(NAME.RNO=A.RNO) WHERE A.RSTATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY STAR DESC

SELECT V_INF.*, PI.PRENAMEDNAME, NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_COMMENT WHERE PNO=1 AND CSTATUS = 'Y') PC_CNT FROM V_INF JOIN PICTURE PI ON(V_INF.PNO = PI.PNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(V_INF.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE PLEVEL = 0 AND V_INF.PSTATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY LOVECNT DESC

SELECT R.RNO, R.RNAME, R.RCONTENT, R.ADDRESS, NAME.PRENAMEDNAME FROM (SELECT RNO, RNAME, RCONTENT, SUBSTR(ADDRESS, 1, 7) ADDRESS FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR RCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') R left JOIN (SELECT PC.*, P.RNO FROM( SELECT PRENAMEDNAME,PNO FROM PICTURE WHERE PLEVEL=0) PC JOIN POST P ON(P.PNO=PC.PNO) JOIN (SELECT MIN(PNO) "PNO", RNO FROM POST WHERE PSTATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY RNO) MINPOST ON(MINPOST.PNO=PC.PNO)) NAME ON(NAME.RNO=R.RNO) ORDER BY RNO DESC

SELECT R.*, PI.PRENAMEDNAME, M.NICKNAME "NICKNAME" FROM (SELECT RE.RNO, P.PNO, RE.RNAME, P.PCONTENT, SUBSTR(ADDRESS, 1, 7) ADDRESS, P.MEMBER_ID FROM RESTAURANT RE JOIN POST P ON(P.RNO = RE.RNO) WHERE RE.RSTATUS = 'Y') R JOIN PICTURE PI ON(PI.PNO=R.PNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_ID = R.MEMBER_ID) WHERE PLEVEL = 0 AND RNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR PCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY R.PNO DESC

SELECT SUM(DECODE(GENDER, 'M', 1, 0)) "남자",
SUM(DECODE(GENDER, 'F', 1, 0)) "여자" FROM MEMBER JOIN POST USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE RNO = ${rno}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY') "YEAR" , MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER) WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM POST WHERE RNO=${rno})) E WHERE E."YEAR"LIKE '1%') "10대", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY') "YEAR" , MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER) WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM POST WHERE RNO=${rno})) E WHERE E."YEAR"LIKE '2%') "20대", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY') "YEAR" , MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER) WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM POST WHERE RNO=${rno})) E WHERE E."YEAR"LIKE '3%') "30대", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY') "YEAR" , MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER) WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM POST WHERE RNO=${rno})) E WHERE E."YEAR"LIKE '4%') "40대", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY') "YEAR" , MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER) WHERE MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM POST WHERE RNO=${rno})) WRITER WHERE WRITER."YEAR" >=50) "50대 이상" FROM DUAL

SELECT PI.PRENAMEDNAME, P.RNO,P.STAR, R.* FROM PICTURE PI JOIN POST P ON(P.PNO=PI.PNO) JOIN ( SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RSTATUS='Y' AND ADDRESS LIKE (SUBSTR ('${adress}', 1, 2)||'%') AND ROWNUM < 5) R ON(R.RNO=P.RNO) WHERE PI.PLEVEL=0 AND PICTURE_STATUS='Y' AND (P.PNO, P.RNO) IN (SELECT MIN(PNO), RNO FROM POST WHERE PSTATUS='Y' GROUP BY RNO)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE RNO = ${rno} and PSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.* , PO."AVG_STAR", PO."PCNT", (SELECT PNO FROM PICTURE WHERE PNO = (SELECT MIN(PNO) FROM POST JOIN RESTAURANT USING(RNO) WHERE RNO = PO.RNO GROUP BY RNO, RNAME) AND ROWNUM < 2) "PIC_NO", (SELECT PORIGINNAME FROM PICTURE WHERE PNO = (SELECT MIN(PNO) FROM POST JOIN RESTAURANT USING(RNO) WHERE RNO = PO.RNO GROUP BY RNO, RNAME) AND ROWNUM < 2) "PIC_ORIGINNAME", (SELECT PRENAMEDNAME FROM PICTURE WHERE PNO = (SELECT MIN(PNO) FROM POST JOIN RESTAURANT USING(RNO) WHERE RNO = PO.RNO GROUP BY RNO, RNAME) AND ROWNUM < 2) "PRENAMEDNAME" FROM (SELECT RNO, ROUND(AVG(STAR),1) "AVG_STAR", COUNT(PNO) "PCNT" FROM POST GROUP BY RNO ORDER BY 1 , 2) PO JOIN RESTAURANT R ON(R.RNO=PO.RNO) WHERE RSTATUS='Y'AND ADMINSTATUS='C' OR ADMINSTATUS='A'

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESTAURANT WHERE CATEGORY = '한식') 한식, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESTAURANT WHERE CATEGORY ='중식') 중식, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESTAURANT WHERE CATEGORY ='일식') 일식, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESTAURANT WHERE CATEGORY ='양식') 양식, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESTAURANT WHERE CATEGORY ='기타') 기타 FROM DUAL
